sen.j: 色彩には特に規定があったわけではないが、若い娘や若奥様は鹿の子絞りで装飾した赤や桃色の華やかな色、年配の婦人は無地の藤色や浅葱色など落ち着いた色をよく使った。
sen.e: Although there were no particular rules, young women and wives were often wearing Tegaras of Kanokoshibori (a kind of tie-dyeing) in bright colors like red and pink and older women, plain Tegaras in calm colors like soft lilac and light blue.
